# Change: 'createSequence'

Create Sequence

## XML Sample ##

        maxValue="371717"
        minValue="371717"
        ordered="true"
        schemaName="public"
        sequenceName="A String"
        startValue="371717"/>
{% endhighlight %}

## SQL Generated From Above Sample (Oracle)

{% highlight sql %}
